rooms.name: Comfort Room
rooms.description:
Our Comfort Rooms offer a peaceful retreat with modern amenities and thoughtful touches. Perfect for couples or solo travelers seeking a cozy base for their Texel adventure.

Each room features a plush king bed, ensuite bathroom with rain shower, and a work desk. Large windows bring in natural light and offer views of the hotel gardens.
rooms.shortDescription: Cozy retreat with modern amenities, perfect for couples exploring Texel.

rooms.name: Deluxe Sea View
rooms.description:
Wake up to breathtaking views of the Wadden Sea in our Deluxe Sea View rooms. Spacious and elegantly appointed, these rooms feature a private balcony where you can enjoy the morning sun and sea breeze.

The generous bathroom includes both a rain shower and deep soaking tub. A seating area provides the perfect spot to unwind with a book from our curated library.
rooms.shortDescription: Spacious room with private balcony overlooking the UNESCO-listed Wadden Sea.

rooms.name: Dune Suite
rooms.description:
Our signature Dune Suite offers an unparalleled luxury experience with panoramic views of both the sea and the iconic Texel dunes. This expansive suite features a separate living area, master bedroom, and spa-inspired bathroom.

Enjoy exclusive amenities including complimentary champagne on arrival, daily breakfast in-room or at our restaurant, and priority spa bookings. The private terrace is perfect for watching spectacular Texel sunsets.
rooms.shortDescription: Signature suite with panoramic views, separate living area, and exclusive amenities.

rooms.name: Wadden Penthouse
rooms.description:
The crown jewel of Grand Hotel Opduin, the Wadden Penthouse offers an unmatched luxury experience. Occupying the entire top floor, this 120m² haven features 360-degree views, two bedrooms, a full kitchen, and a wraparound terrace.

Personalized butler service, private dining experiences, and exclusive access to our rooftop lounge make this the ultimate Texel retreat. Perfect for special celebrations or discerning travelers seeking absolute privacy and luxury.
rooms.shortDescription: Ultimate luxury with 360° views, butler service, and wraparound terrace.

rooms.name: Family Dune Room
rooms.description:
Designed with families in mind, our Family Dune Room offers ample space for parents and children to relax together. The interconnected layout provides privacy while keeping everyone close.

Child-friendly amenities include a welcome gift for young guests, kid-sized robes and slippers, and access to our family activity program. The room's dune-view location is perfect for spotting the local wildlife.
rooms.shortDescription: Spacious family accommodation with child-friendly amenities and dune views.

testimonials.quote: An absolute gem on Texel. The staff remembered our preferences from our last visit two years ago. The Dune Suite views at sunset are something you'll never forget. We've already booked our next stay.
The restaurant exceeded our expectations. Michelin-quality cuisine with ingredients sourced from the island. The lamb was incredible, and the sommelier's local wine pairings were perfect.
We came for the spa and stayed for everything else. The thalassotherapy treatment using local seaweed was unlike anything we've experienced. Truly restorative.
Traveling with three kids isn't easy, but the hotel made it seamless. The family room was spacious, the kids' activity program kept them engaged, and we parents finally got to relax.

The location is unbeatable. Waking up to the sound of waves and having direct beach access made this our best holiday in years. The hotel strikes the perfect balance between luxury and casual comfort.
